actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to repeal the provisions of the September 11th Victim Compensation Fund of 2001 that requires the reduction  of a claimant's compensation by the amount of any collateral source compensation payments the claimant is entitled to receive, and for other purposes.
short_title: September 11th Victim Compensation Fund Fairness Act of 2003

summary.text: September 11th Victim Compensation Fund Fairness Act of 2003 - Eliminates the collateral compensation offset requirement of the September 11th Victim Compensation Fund of 2001.

titles.title: September 11th Victim Compensation Fund Fairness Act of 2003

A bill to repeal the provisions of the September 11th Victim Compensation Fund of 2001 that requires the reduction  of a claimant's compensation by the amount of any collateral source compensation payments the claimant is entitled to receive, and for other purposes.
